gaze features.from sentence: We observe that across all three datasets , including all three annotations of BROADCAST , gaze features lead to improvements over our baseline 3 - layer bi - LSTM .

CASCADED - LSTM.from sentence: Also , CASCADED - LSTM is consistently better than MULTITASK - LSTM . : Results ( F1 ) .

all three datasets.from sentence: For all three datasets , the inclusion of gaze measures ( first pass duration ( FP ) and regression duration ( Regr. ) ) leads to improvements over the baseline .

harder datasets.from sentence: With the harder datasets , the impact of the gaze information becomes stronger , consistently favouring the cascaded architecture , and with improvements using both first pass duration and regression duration , the late measure associated with interpretation of content .
